metadata.name: Temporary Access Pass Added To An Account
metadata.comment: Detects when a temporary access pass (TAP) is added to an account. TAPs added to priv accounts should be investigated

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(message) = lower('admin registered security info') AND lower(status_code) = lower('admin registered temporary access pass method for user'))

output.summary: Detects when a temporary access pass (TAP) is added to an account. TAPs added to priv accounts should be investigated

metadata.objective: False positive: Administrator adding a legitimate temporary access pass Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-privileged-accounts#changes-to-privileged-accounts
